import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { NavLink, Modal, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Button, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Row, Col, Collapse } from "reactstrap"; import '../modal.css'; class SignupButton extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { signupFormModal: false, emailCollapse: false, passwordCollapse: false, confirmPasswordCollapse: false, }; this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); } toggle(){ this.setState(state => ({ collapse: !state.emailCollapse })); this.setState(state => ({ collapse: !state.passwordCollapse })); this.setState(state => ({ collapse: !state.confirmPasswordCollapse })); } toggleModal = state => { this.setState({ [state]: !this.state[state] }); }; render() { let _buttonOrLink; if (this.props.buttonOrLink === "button") { _buttonOrLink = ( ); } else { _buttonOrLink = ( this.toggleModal("signupFormModal")} > {this.props.title} ); } return (
{_buttonOrLink}
this.toggleModal("signupFormModal")} >
